//Hi, I'm Chris aka CountChrisdo a Graphic Designer and 3D artist who wants to create a bunch of SCP stuff. This will be the hub for all this content//

+ __SCP FanArt__

++ SCP-1050 - Obsidian Obelisk
First known photo of SCP-1050-1 recovered from a German research facility in [REDACTED]

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/JRFWj2I.jpg]]

++ SCP-2557 - Envelope Logistics
 A holding of Envelope Logistics has just been minted as a new NFA (Non-Fungible Anomaly) currently held by one of their top performing entities V*H*Q*H 

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/H6O8TOW.jpg]]



@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
